name: Wronged Monk's Wrath
summary: You gain the wronged monk's wrath ki spell.
description:
You gain the wronged monk's wrath ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.TraitsUncommon: Something of uncommon rarity requires special training or comes from a particular culture or part of the world. Some character choices give access to uncommon options, and the GM can choose to allow access for anyone. Less is known about uncommon creatures than common creatures. They typically can't be summoned. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to these creature is increased by 2.

FeatsSource Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island pg. 74
The player characters might learn some of these techniques from friends and rivals during their stay on Bonmu, allowing them to select the feats the next time they would gain a feat. Surviving combat against Syu Tak-nwa allows the characters to take the three witch feats, while defeating or impressing the Ahmoza twins allows them to take Entwined Energy Ki. Lighting the candles and praying in the temple of Irori's prayer room (area A8) gives them access to Wronged Monk's Wrath.


Related Feats: Entwined Energy Ki, Syu Tak-Nwa's Deadly Hair, Syu Tak-Nwa's Hexed Locks, Syu Tak-Nwa's Skillful Tresses
